name: 鄭國忠
objective:
介紹高分子物理、化學及光電等性質，並且回顧及展望高分子在生化、醫學及光電產業的應用。
Introduction
Polyolefins
Engineering thermoplastics
Rubber
Silicon rubber 
TPE
Epoxy Resins
Composites
Nanocomposites
LCP 
Hyperbranched polymers
Flame retardant
Biomedical polymers
UV curing
schedule:
Weeks 1-8:
Introduction
Polyolefins
Engineering thermoplastics
Rubber
Silicon rubber 
TPE
Epoxy Resins
Week 9:Mid-Exam.
Weeks 10-17:
Composites
Nanocomposites
LCP 
Hyperbranched polymers
Flame retardant
Biomedical polymers
UV curing
Report
Week 18:Final-Exam.
scorePolicy:
Mid-exam: 0-30
Final-exam: 0-40
Class Attendance; Homework and Report, etc.: 0-30
Max.:100
materials:
參考書目:
http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/book/9780080434179
Applied Polymer Science: 21st Century
Clara D. Craver and Charles E. Carraher, Jr.
Elsevier B.V.
